evidence.claim: Pleio utilizes AWS Lambda for serverless computing.
The platform complies with HIPAA regulations to ensure data security in healthcare applications.
Pleio implements HL7 standards to integrate with healthcare systems efficiently.
Our platform supports FHIR APIs for interoperability with EHRs.
We leverage Twilio API for communication within our health tech solutions.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of handling X12 transactions or EDI use cases found.
